    {
        // ========== INDEXES ==========
        
        // Accounts
        modelBuilder.Entity<Account>()
            .HasIndex(a => a.ApplicationId);
        
        modelBuilder.Entity<Account>()
            .HasIndex(a => a.BoutiqueId);
        
        modelBuilder.Entity<Account>()

        // Categories
        modelBuilder.Entity<Category>()
            .HasIndex(c => c.ApplicationId);
        
        modelBuilder.Entity<Category>()

        modelBuilder.Entity<Category>()
            .HasIndex(c => new { c.ApplicationId, c.Name })
            .IsUnique();

        // CashFlows
        modelBuilder.Entity<CashFlow>()
            .HasIndex(cf => cf.ApplicationId);
        
        modelBuilder.Entity<CashFlow>()
            .HasIndex(cf => cf.BoutiqueId);
        
        modelBuilder.Entity<CashFlow>()
            .HasIndex(cf => cf.Type);
        
        modelBuilder.Entity<CashFlow>()
            .HasIndex(cf => cf.Status);
        
        modelBuilder.Entity<CashFlow>()
            .HasIndex(cf => cf.AccountId);
        
        modelBuilder.Entity<CashFlow>()
            .HasIndex(cf => cf.CategoryId);
        
        modelBuilder.Entity<CashFlow>()
            .HasIndex(cf => cf.Date);
        
        modelBuilder.Entity<CashFlow>()
            .HasIndex(cf => cf.IsReconciled);
        
        modelBuilder.Entity<CashFlow>()
            .HasIndex(cf => cf.BudgetId);

        modelBuilder.Entity<RecurringCashFlow>()

        modelBuilder.Entity<RecurringCashFlow>()

        modelBuilder.Entity<RecurringCashFlow>()
            .HasIndex(rcf => rcf.NextOccurrence);
        
        modelBuilder.Entity<RecurringCashFlow>()
            .HasIndex(rcf => rcf.IsActive);

        // Budgets
        modelBuilder.Entity<Budget>()
            .HasIndex(b => b.ApplicationId);
        
        modelBuilder.Entity<Budget>()
            .HasIndex(b => b.BoutiqueId);
        
        modelBuilder.Entity<Budget>()
            .HasIndex(b => b.IsActive);
        
        modelBuilder.Entity<Budget>()
            .HasIndex(b => b.IsExceeded);
        
        modelBuilder.Entity<Budget>()
            .HasIndex(b => new { b.StartDate, b.EndDate });

        // BudgetCategories
        modelBuilder.Entity<BudgetCategory>()
            .HasIndex(bc => new { bc.BudgetId, bc.CategoryId })
            .IsUnique();

        // ========== UNIQUE CONSTRAINTS ==========
        
        // PaymentMethods
        modelBuilder.Entity<PaymentMethod>()
            .HasIndex(pm => pm.ApplicationId);
        
        modelBuilder.Entity<PaymentMethod>()
            .HasIndex(pm => pm.BoutiqueId);

        // ========== RELATIONS & DELETE BEHAVIORS ==========
        
        // CashFlow ‚Üí Account
        modelBuilder.Entity<CashFlow>()
            .HasOne(cf => cf.Account)
            .WithMany(a => a.CashFlows)
            .HasForeignKey(cf => cf.AccountId)
            .OnDelete(DeleteBehavior.Restrict);

        // CashFlow ‚Üí DestinationAccount (pour TRANSFER)

            .HasOne(cf => cf.DestinationAccount)
            .WithMany(a => a.DestinationCashFlows)
            .HasForeignKey(cf => cf.DestinationAccountId)
            .OnDelete(DeleteBehavior.Restrict);

            .WithMany(c => c.CashFlows)
            .HasForeignKey(cf => cf.CategoryId)
            .OnDelete(DeleteBehavior.Restrict);

        // CashFlow ‚Üí RecurringCashFlow
        modelBuilder.Entity<CashFlow>()

            .WithMany(rcf => rcf.GeneratedCashFlows)
            .HasForeignKey(cf => cf.RecurringCashFlowId)
            .OnDelete(DeleteBehavior.SetNull);

        // CashFlow ‚Üí Budget
        modelBuilder.Entity<CashFlow>()
            .HasOne(cf => cf.Budget)
            .WithMany(b => b.Expenses)
            .HasForeignKey(cf => cf.BudgetId)
            .OnDelete(DeleteBehavior.SetNull);

        // RecurringCashFlow ‚Üí Category
        modelBuilder.Entity<RecurringCashFlow>()
            .HasOne(rcf => rcf.Category)
            .WithMany(c => c.RecurringCashFlows)
            .HasForeignKey(rcf => rcf.CategoryId)
            .OnDelete(DeleteBehavior.Restrict);

        // RecurringCashFlow ‚Üí Account
        modelBuilder.Entity<RecurringCashFlow>()
            .HasOne(rcf => rcf.Account)
            .WithMany()
            .HasForeignKey(rcf => rcf.AccountId)
            .OnDelete(DeleteBehavior.Restrict);

        // BudgetCategory ‚Üí Budget
        modelBuilder.Entity<BudgetCategory>()
            .HasOne(bc => bc.Budget)
            .WithMany(b => b.BudgetCategories)
            .HasForeignKey(bc => bc.BudgetId)
